mapper.insert: insert into PRODUCT_REVIEW (product_no, order_no, order_detail_no, product_review_writer, product_review_content, product_review_star, product_review_write_date) values (#{productNo}, #{orderNo}, #{orderDetailNo}, #{productReviewWriter}, #{productReviewContent}, #{productReviewStar}, #{productReviewWriteDate})
mapper.select: SELECT pr.PRODUCT_NO, p.product_name, 'http://localhost:8081/api/v1/image/product?name=' || pi.product_image_filename as product_image FROM PRODUCT_REVIEW pr JOIN PRODUCT p ON pr.product_no = p.product_no JOIN PRODUCT_IMAGE pi ON pr.product_no = pi.product_no
